alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 6:43PM MST until March 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Dundy County. In Colorado, Yuma County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chance to see these wintry conditions in Yuma county will be along/north of Highway 36.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
